Actions.Text: REFERRED TO LIBRARIES AND EDUCATION TECHNOLOGY

Title: Directs petitions to the secretary of the Gold Coast public library district and extends the petition filing date for the office of member of the board of trustees of the library district
Summary: Directs petitions to the secretary of the Gold Coast public library district or his or her designee; extends the petition filing date for the office of member of the board of trustees of the library district to no later than the thirtieth day preceding the election.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 233 of the laws of 2000 relating to authorizing the town boards of the towns of Oyster Bay and North Hempstead, county of Nassau, to establish the Gold Coast public library district, in relation to directing petitions to the secretary of the Gold Coast public library district and extending the petition filing date
